dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.backend

Interface ICDSEngineBackend

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCDSEngineBackend, CBackend

    public interface ICDSEngineBackend
    Interface defining a backend of the CDS generator engine.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endScope(CDSGenFile cdsFile)
      Informs the backend that the actual scope has been closed.
      void initializer(CDSGenFile cdsFile, CType var, java.lang.String lineTerm)
      Generates the initializer for the variable definition of the given CType into the given cdsFile.
      void startScope(CDSGenFile cdsFile)
      Informs the backend that a new scope has been created.
      void type(CDSGenFile cdsFile, CType var, java.lang.Class<? extends CType> clazz)
      Generates type definitions of the given class and all its references into the given cdsFile.
      void typedIdentifier(CDSGenFile cdsFile, CType var)
      Generates a the typed identifier of a variable definition of the given CType into the given cdsFile.
      void var(CDSGenFile cdsFile, CType var)
      Generates a variable definition of the given CType into the given cdsFile.

    • Method Detail

      • startScope

        void startScope(CDSGenFile cdsFile)
        Informs the backend that a new scope has been created. Generates output for the starting scope.
        Parameters:
        cdsFile - The cdsFile to write output to.
        Since:
        2008.b

      • endScope

        void endScope(CDSGenFile cdsFile)
        Informs the backend that the actual scope has been closed. Generates output for the ending scope.
        Parameters:
        cdsFile - The cdsFile to write output to.
        Since:
        2008.b

      • type

        void type(CDSGenFile cdsFile,
          CType var,
          java.lang.Class<? extends CType> clazz)
        Generates type definitions of the given class and all its references into the given cdsFile.
        Parameters:
        cdsFile - The cdsFile to write the type defs to.
        var - The CType object to write.
        clazz - The class or one of its super classes of the CType object to write.
        Since:
        2008.b

      • typedIdentifier

        void typedIdentifier(CDSGenFile cdsFile,
                     CType var)
        Generates a the typed identifier of a variable definition of the given CType into the given cdsFile. This method doesn't care if the type of the variable has already been defined or not.
        Parameters:
        cdsFile - The file to generate the variable into.
        var - The variable to generate the identifier for.
        Throws:
        CDSGenAPIException - in case of an public API error
        Since:
        13.0

      • initializer

        void initializer(CDSGenFile cdsFile,
                 CType var,
                 java.lang.String lineTerm)
        Generates the initializer for the variable definition of the given CType into the given cdsFile. This method doesn't care if the type of the variable has already been defined or not.
        Parameters:
        cdsFile - The file to generate the variable into.
        var - The variable to generate the identifier for.
        lineTerm - A string that is appended to each generated line prior to the newline character
        Throws:
        CDSGenAPIException - in case of an public API error
        Since:
        13.0

      • var

        void var(CDSGenFile cdsFile,
         CType var)
        Generates a variable definition of the given CType into the given cdsFile.
        Parameters:
        cdsFile - The file to generate the variable into.
        var - The CType object to write.
        Since:
        2008.b
